item.title: 最新消息：根据美国疾病预防控制中心（CDC）的新指南，COVID-19 病毒康复者在症状结束后无需再隔离五天。
item.description:
LATEST: People who are recovering from COVID-19 no longer need to remain isolated for five days after symptoms end, according to new guidance from the CDC. https://t.co/DtDoZYd6RP

item.title: "在对装甲师汉娜-古铁雷斯（Hannah Gutierrez）的过失杀人审判中，他和摄影师哈丽娜-哈钦斯（Halyna Hutchins）在《锈》片场遭到枪击，《锈》的导演乔尔-索萨（Joel Souza）回忆了当时的 "混乱 "场面和混乱状况。
item.description:
"Rust" director Joel Souza recalled the "chaotic" scene and confusion after he and cinematographer Halyna Hutchins were shot on the set of "Rust" during the involuntary manslaughter trial of armorer Hannah Gutierrez. https://t.co/RrVWkgNYTf

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 新消息：周四，一名年轻女孩在长岛的一个公园里无意中发现了一截断肢，据官员称，调查发现了更多的肢体残骸。

item.title: 南卡罗来纳州一名男子周五认罪，他向一名联邦法官发送了一封恐吓信，信中写道："我曾多次目送你离开法院，并密谋报复"。
item.description:
A South Carolina man pleaded guilty on Friday for sending a threatening letter to a federal judge that read, in part, "I have watched you leave the courthouse numerous times and plotted to get my revenge." https://t.co/hqPpKAxZmv

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 洛杉矶道奇队球星大谷翔平（Shohei Ohtani）在自己的 Instagram 上向粉丝们发布了一份惊喜声明，透露自己已与一位来自日本的女士结婚。
item.description:
In a surprise statement to his fans posted on his Instagram, Los Angeles Dodgers star Shohei Ohtani revealed he has gotten married to a woman from Japan. https://t.co/Ratx4qlr0Y

item.title: 最新消息：CVS 和沃尔格林连锁药店宣布，将于本月内在美国多个州开始销售堕胎药米非司酮。拜登总统在一份声明中称此举是确保人们获得这种药物的 "重要里程碑"。
item.description:
BREAKING: CVS and Walgreens will begin selling the abortion pill mifepristone within the month in several states, the pharmacy chains announced.

In a statement, Pres. Biden called the move an "important milestone" in ensuring access to the drug. https://t.co/23vlhbmZdn pic.twitter.com/1rviFolgbm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）周五重申了她将在 "超级星期二 "之前继续参加总统初选的承诺，并暗示在 "超级星期二 "之后是否继续参选将取决于她在初选和党团会议中是否仍有 "竞争力"。
item.description:
Nikki Haley on Friday reiterated her promise to stay in the presidential primary race through Super Tuesday, hinting that decisions to stay in the race beyond Tuesday will be based on whether she's still "competitive" in primaries and caucuses. https://t.co/wk8j2GTZ0J

item.title: 威尔士亲王威廉王子访问威尔士，纪念圣大卫节。他收到了一位小球迷赠送的水仙花，然后又收到了一件印有他名字的雷克瑟姆足球俱乐部球衣，并与联合主席、《阳光灿烂的日子》（It's Always Sunny）主演罗布-麦克艾伦尼（Rob McElhenney）共饮一杯。
item.description:
Prince William, Prince of Wales, marked St. David's Day with a visit to Wales.

He was given a daffodil by a young fan, before receiving a Wrexham AFC shirt with his name on and sharing a drink with co-chairman and "It's Always Sunny" star Rob McElhenney. https://t.co/AkmiY8smL3 pic.twitter.com/kiZN2Fa7mD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: "如果不是我的家人和朋友有能力把钱存到我的银行账户上，我早就流落街头了。"最近的一项研究发现，半数美国租房者为住房成本所累，这反映了全国租房者面临的严峻现实。
item.description:
"Had I not had family and friends that could afford to just put money in my bank account, I'd be on the streets.”

Half of American renters are burdened by the cost of housing, a recent study found, capturing the grim reality facing renters nationwide. https://t.co/Z34j7c2bCn

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 根据周五公布的一份死因调查报告，英国王室姻亲托马斯-金斯顿（Thomas Kingston）显然死于自杀。
item.description:

item.title: 最新消息：法官斯科特-麦卡菲（Scott McAfee）将于今天下午听取关于取消检察官法尼-威利斯（Fani Willis）资格的动议的最后辩论，该动议基于她与检察官内森-韦德（Nathan Wade）的恋爱关系而获得经济利益的指控。
item.description:
LATEST: Judge Scott McAfee will hear what are expected to be final arguments this afternoon on motions to disqualify DA Fani Willis based on allegations that she benefited financially from a romantic relationship with prosecutor Nathan Wade. https://t.co/go2DjByksm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 教皇方济各一直患有流感，周五在梵蒂冈举行的一次会议上，他要求助手宣读他准备好的演讲稿，称他尚未从最近的病痛中完全恢复过来。
item.description:

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 一辆摩托车撞上了一辆汽车，车内有一对母女，佛罗里达州一名副警长思维敏捷，在撞车后几秒钟内就赶到了现场，被誉为拯救了生命。

After a motorcycle crashed into a car with a mother and her two daughters inside, a Florida deputy’s quick thinking — and his arrival to the scene within seconds of the collision — is being heralded for saving lives. https://t.co/xniIYmesTZ pic.twitter.com/Q0fA5oqkwl

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）正在起诉 OpenAI 及其首席执行官山姆-阿尔特曼（Sam Altman），称其背叛了该 ChatGPT 制造商的创始宗旨--造福人类而非追求利润。
item.description:
Elon Musk is suing OpenAI and its CEO Sam Altman over what he says is a betrayal of the ChatGPT maker's founding aims of benefiting humanity rather than pursuing profits. https://t.co/WdpKYqMYDR pic.twitter.com/6IFCIIdjDS

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: 环保活动人士正在柏林附近的一片森林中举行抗议活动，反对扩建电动汽车制造商特斯拉欧洲首家工厂的计划，并誓言要在原地待命数周。
item.description:
Environmental activists are staging a protest in a forest near Berlin against plans to expand the grounds of electric carmaker Tesla's first plant in Europe and are vowing to stay in place for weeks. https://t.co/QWMSh9SRs6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024

item.title: "@JamesAALongman 从乌克兰的一家武器工厂发回的报道称："乌克兰人基本上不得不设法秘密制造武器，希望不会遭到俄罗斯人的轰炸。
item.description:
"Essentially the Ukrainians have to try to make weapons in secret, hoping that they don't get bombed by the Russians."@JamesAALongman reports from a weapons factory in Ukraine. https://t.co/SdtJQL2MXP pic.twitter.com/fkORvXAKLV

— ABC News (@ABC) March 1, 2024
